name: Marble Marcher Mod JJ
description:
You control happy ball, that travel from dimension to dimension

completing clueless tasks to achieve magic goals.

==

CaptainTim Quote:

"Unique and Impressive Visuals

achieved by LowSpec RayTacing

combined with Magical Fractals

===

Marble Marcher JJ is rewritten Game/Modification of Marble Marcher

with slightly changed graphics, increased performance

and a level editor with levels in Text format for easy sharing.
